department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Victor Aronovich worked at ABC-TV as a writer, producer and director for almost 20 years. During this time, he created hundreds of diverse video programs that received numerous national and international awards including four Emmys. His TV programs were watched by millions of viewers. <br>In 1994, Victor founded Prime-Time Productions and the company has produced numerous programs & documentaries  for major corporations and TV networks. These productions also received many awards. <br><br>	Victor has been teaching film and video production courses at various film schools.<br>
